welcome_text: Your throbbing headache is what wakes you. Your vision is blurred, you feel dizzy, and the fuzzy image of a room spins around you. After a few moments you come back to your senses, your surroundings coming into focus. Something is off... Frantically searching your personage, you realize that you are missing your wallet and keys, your pockets completely empty. You can't remember for the life of you where you put them! They must be around here somewhere...
